settings.name: Reference time
settings.description: Select a reference time towards which your data are evaluated. Default is NOW.

settings.name: Track time duration.
settings.description: Provide a time duration (in days) of how far in the past you want to plot your track(s).

settings.name: Stadia API key
settings.description: For visualisation of the tracks on map background you need to enter an API key from stadia here. Note that this is only a workaround for a few months until MoveApps provides an own OSM mirror. Register for a stadia API key here, it is free: https://stadiamaps.com/stamen/onboarding/create-account.
